panels.title: Total Available Memory

panels.title: Ratio Memory usage / Memory limit (not kube-system)

Ratio CPU usage / CPU request (not kube-system)
Capacity of applications (ratio of available replicas out of specified replicas)
Rate of OOM events per container

panels.description: Rate of received errors out of rate of received packets

targets.expr: sum without(instance) ((sum(rate(node_network_receive_errs_total[1m])) by(instance) / sum(rate(node_network_receive_packets_total[1m])) by (instance)) * on(instance) group_left(nodename) (node_uname_info))

panels.title: Received error ratio

targets.expr: sum without(instance) ((sum(rate(node_network_transmit_errs_total[1m])) by(instance) / sum(rate(node_network_transmit_packets_total[1m])) by (instance)) * on(instance) group_left(nodename) (node_uname_info))
